p: Julian day of collection was negatively associated with FFD (slope = −42.403; 95% CI = 47.611, 37.195; R 2 c = 0.714) and precipitation (slope = −1.219; 95% CI = −2.260, −0.179; R 2 c = 0.427) at a given latitude, but was not significantly associated with FFD*precipitation (slope = 0.377; 95% CI = −0.736, 1.490; R 2 c = 0.719; Table S5).
